summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of West 45th Street, from 3rd Avenue Northwest to 11th Avenue Northwest; West 46th Street, from 9th Avenue Northwest to Shilshole Avenue; West 47th Street, from 9th Avenue Northwest to 14th Avenue Northwest; West 48th Street, from 9th Avenue Northwest to 17th Avenue Northwest; West 49th Street, from 9th Avenue Northwest to 11th Avenue Northwest and from 14th Avenue Northwest to 17th Avenue Northwest; West 51st Street, West 52nd Street and Market Street, each from 8th Avenue Northwest to 17th Avenue Northwest; West 53rd Street from 11th Avenue Northwest to 17th Avenue Northwest; West 54th Street, from 14th Avenue Northwest to17th Avenue Northwest; Russell Avenue from 17th Avenue Northwest to 20th all in accordance with Resolution No. 6130, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
